about.title: About.

image.alt: Thibault Jan Beyer visiting Kimchi Princess Restaurant in Berlin

text: I build apps on the web. People I work with call me a Javascript Software Engeneer. At the age of 11 I’ve build my first website, since then, I’ve never stopped coding. Around 6 years ago I turned my passion into a profession. Since then, I’ve build dozens of single page apps. It’s fair to say that I’m an expert for rich internet applications.

I’ve worked for various companies, some huge, some small. Currently, I am employed at 1&1 IONOS PRO Cloud GmbH. In past, I’ve worked on web-apps and websites for BMW, Hi-Res, APT, Neomatcha, Outdoorgym, Rubbeldiekatz, Vorablesen, edenspiekermann_, and many more. I like to contribute to the whole process: conception, design, frontend, backend.

For me, it’s much more than just another job. In my spare time, if I’m not traveling or playing, I’m contributing and writing open source projects and tools for which I was fortunate enough to win some awards.

You can find details on my career path at linkedin, browse through my open source projects on github, hear me tweet and checkout my blog for case studies and more details on my work. You can also write me an email via thibault.beyer@gmail.com
